_comment: State template for project-memory skill personalization tracking
_description: This file tracks the state of project interactions and personalization features
_initialized_description: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when personalization was first activated for this project
_version_description: Schema version for this state file format

personalization._comment: Tracks personalization features and user interaction states
personalization._waldo_greeted_description: Boolean flag indicating whether the Waldo character has greeted the user in this project
personalization._plan_created_description: Boolean flag indicating whether a project plan has been created
personalization._plan_status_description: Current status of the project plan. Valid values: 'planned' (plan exists but not started), 'in_implementation' (actively working on plan), 'complete' (plan fully implemented)
personalization._plan_file_description: Absolute file path to the project plan document (e.g., 'C:\Users\taylo\intuition\projects\my-project\project_plan.md')
